description: Optional cross-domain integration stress suite for false-unification resistance.

RG-14.name: Weak bridge evidence abstains
RG-14.intent: When cross-domain bridge evidence is weak, the agent must avoid forced unification and abstain.

RG-15.name: Strong bridge stays scoped and sourced
RG-15.intent: When bridge evidence is strong, integration must remain scoped with split provenance and explicit falsifiers.
